extension.description: PrBoom is a version of the classic 3D shoot'em'up game Doom, originally written by id Software.[CR][CR]PrBoom is a game engine - it provides a program to play Doom levels, but it doesn't include any levels itself. To play PrBoom, you need one of the main Doom date files (called the IWAD) from id Software - doom.wad, doom2.wad, tnt.wad or plutonia.wad - or the shareware doom1.wad.[CR][CR]If you don't own any of the Doom games, get the shareware doom1.wad from doom19s.zip on Doomworld's shareware download page. http://www.doomworld.com/files/shareware.shtml[CR][CR]Source: https://github.com/libretro/libretro-prboom
